metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20365 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
LibRaw::raw2image() in libraw_cxx.cpp has a heap-based buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20365` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.3
libraw16 - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.18.8-1ubuntu0.3').
ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
